text: allahu ninne avarilearu kuttaruteyatutt tiriccettikkukayum ‎pinne marrearu yud'dhattin pearan avar ninneat anuvadam ‎ceadikkukayum ceytal ni parayuka: "ini ninnalkkeanrikkalum ‎enneateatt purappetanavilla. ninnal enre kute satruveat ‎pearutunnatumalla. tirccapayayum adya tavana yud'dhattil ‎ninnealinnuninnatil trptiyatayukayanallea ninnal ceytat. ‎atinal yud'dhattil ninn vittealinnu catannirikkunnavareateappam ‎ninnalum irunnukealluka.” ‎
